articles.title: When Steven Gerrard could replace Jurgen Klopp at Liverpool as Rangers exit 'inevitable' - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Former Rangers chairman Dave King is confident Steven Gerrard will remain at Ibrox until the end of his contract in 2024
articles.content:
A Rangers exit for Steven Gerrard is 'inevitable' according to former Rangers chairman Dave King.
